[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: ShellExec {
                parts: [
                    Literal(
                        "Hello, ",
                    ),
                    Expression(
                        Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        3,
                                        2,
                                    ),
                                    name: "name",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    ),
                ],
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                3,
                15,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
